title: Verify: Selecting the WWE Network Channel successfully opens WWE Network
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their Apple TV device
AND has gone to the "App Store"
AND has added the "WWE Network"
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the "WWE Network" Channel from the Apple TV menu
custom_expected: THEN the "WWE Network" will open successfully

title: Verify: The WWE Network can be accessed while the Apple TV is connected wirelessly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their Apple TV device
AND the Apple TV device is currently connected to a wireless network
AND the "WWE Network" channel is installed
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the "WWE Network" Channel from the Apple TV menu
custom_expected: THEN the "WWE Network" will open successfully

title: Verify: The WWE Network can be accessed while the Apple TV is connected using a wired connection
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their Apple TV device
AND the Apple TV device is currently connected to a wired network connection
AND the "WWE Network" channel is installed
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the "WWE Network" Channel from the Apple TV menu
custom_expected: THEN the "WWE Network" will open successfully

title: Verify: The User is brought to the home screen instead of the cold start screen
Sign in: Verify Login message opens
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network channel
AND we have not previously logged into an account in the channel
custom_steps:
WHEN we access the Sign In page from Main menu
or 
Select video playback
custom_expected:
THEN we will be presented with a Login screen
AND an Email Address field will be present
AND a password field will be present
AND a Submit button will display underneath

title: Sign In: Verify  Sign In success
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network channel
AND we have not previously logged into an account
custom_steps:
WHEN we access the WWE Network channel
AND we select the Sign in with WWE Account option
AND we enter valid WWE credentials
custom_expected:
THEN the credentials will be accepted 
AND we will brought to the WWE Network Home Screen
AND we will see that "Sign In" has changed to "My Account"

title: Sign In: Verify Login failed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network channel
AND we have not previously logged into an account in the channel
custom_steps:
WHEN we access the WWE Network channel
AND we select Sign In > Sign in with my WWE Account
AND we enter invalid WWE credentials
custom_expected:
THEN a  Sign In Error Screen will appear
AND a message regarding 'Invalid email or password' will be stated
AND all formatting and text will be readable
AND an OK button will be present:


>Subscription Required
>The account name or password was incorrect. Please try again.
>OK

title: Sign In: Verify text and formatting are clear and readable
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network Channel
AND we are on the  Sign In Screen
custom_steps:
WHEN we look at the Text
AND we look at the buttons
custom_expected:
THEN we will see that the text is spelled correctly on the page
AND each label is formatted correctly

title: Sign In: Pressing the MENU button from the  Sign In Screen returns the user to the previous screen the user was on
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network channel
AND we are on the Sign In Screen
custom_steps: WHEN we press the Menu button
custom_expected: THEN we will be brought back to the previous screen (usually either the asset detail page or the Sign in Tab Page)

title: Home: Verify Menu options when the WWE Network is accessed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
custom_steps: WHEN we access the main menu page
custom_expected:
THEN the following options will be listed at the top of the screen:
> WWE
> Schedule
> Shows
> Search
> Sign In  (or My Account - is already signed in )

title: Home: Verify text and formatting are clear and readable
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Channel
AND we access the Channel
custom_steps: WHEN we traverse the Home Screen options
custom_expected:
THEN all text will be formatted correctly
AND all thumbnails will appear without issue

title: Home: Verify when the WWE Network Channel is accessed the user lands on the Home screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has installed the WWE Network
custom_steps: WHEN the WWE Network Channel is accessed
custom_expected: THEN the user will be brought to the Home Screen

title: Home: Verify data updates according to config settings
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
custom_steps:
WHEN we are on the Home Screen
AND the Live Broadcast changes
custom_expected:
THEN the Menu will refresh based on the config set
AND the On Now display will update accordingly

title: OnNow: Verify that the current LIVE show is properly displayed

title: OnNow: Verify that the LIVE show properly updates/refreshes as the day progresses
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we are on the Home Section
custom_steps:
WHEN we look at the On Now display in the Feature Area
AND we navigate to this page throughout the course of the day
custom_expected: THEN the ON NOW section will properly update with the EPG schedule

title: ***OnNow: Verify Selecting the ON NOW Feature brings the user to the Live Linear Feed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we are on the Home Section
custom_steps:
WHEN we view the On Now listing in the Feature Area
AND we tap on the Play option
custom_expected:
THEN the LIVE LINEAR feed will launch
AND we will be able to remain in this feed beyond the entry show

**LIVE LINEAR will continue and the user will not be in the Child Event when launched from this page**

title: Schedule: Verify Today's Schedule appears when user looks on the Home screen

AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we are on the Home page
custom_steps: WHEN we look at the Schedule carousel
custom_expected: THEN Today's programming will appear

title: Schedule: Verify navigation control works in both directions
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we are on the Home Page
AND we look at the Schedule carousel
custom_steps:
WHEN we move the cursor to the day's programming
AND we scroll Left
AND we scroll Right
custom_expected:
THEN we will be able to navigate from the Current ON NOW program to the 5 items in the EPG
AND we will be able to navigate in both directions

title: Schedule: Verify Today's schedule properly reflects the current day's programming
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we are on the Home page

EPG link: http://epg.media.net.wwe.com/prod/epg_large2.json
custom_steps: WHEN we look at the Schedule Carousel
custom_expected:
THEN the Today schedule will accurately display the current snapshot of programming schedule for today's content.
The current On Now program + next 4 programs (5 thumbnails display)

title: ***Schedule: Verify LIVE broadcasts are labeled as such ("On Now")
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we are on the Home Page
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Schedule carousel
AND we look at the day's content
custom_expected:
THEN the content in the current time block will be listed as ON NOW
AND the episode will be available to view

title: Schedule: Verify schedule flips at 12 AM
custom_preconds:

AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we have navigated to the Schedule carousel
AND the time is before 12 AM EST
custom_steps:
WHEN the time hits 12 AM EST
AND we refresh the Home day
custom_expected: THEN the "Schedule" will accurately reflect the new calendar day

title: Verify text and formatting are clear and readable
custom_preconds: Continue Watching and Watchlist items must be added to user's test account.
custom_steps: Confirm the text is readable and formatted correctly within each of their own respective carousel.
custom_expected: Text font, size and formatting should be consistent and fit within the designed space.

title: Verify ON NOW/Linear presentation of VOD program is not bookmarked
custom_preconds: ON NOW program should not already be in the current user test account's Watchlist or Continue Watching list.
custom_steps:
1. Note ON NOW program.
2. Launch ON NOW > NOW
3. Let play for 10+ seconds.
4. Exit via BACK.
custom_expected:
Current program should not appear in:

1. WWE> Carousel "Continue Watching"
2. MY ACCOUNT > "Continue Watching"

title: Verify ON NOW/Watch From Beginning presentation of VOD program is bookmarked
custom_preconds: ON NOW program should not already be in the current user test account's Watchlist or Continue Watching list.
custom_steps:
1. Note ON NOW program.
2. Launch ON NOW > FROM BEGINNING
3. Let play for 10+ seconds.
4. Exit via BACK.
custom_expected:
Current program should appear in:

WWE> Carousel "Contine Watching"
MY ACCOUNT > "Continue Watching"

title: Verify Linear Live/Ghost programs are not bookmarked
custom_preconds:
ON NOW program should not already be in the current user test account's Watchlist or Continue Watching list.
ON NOW program should be confirmed a Live event and that From Beginning will launch Ghost version.
custom_steps:
1. Note ON NOW program.
2. Launch ON NOW > FROM BEGINNING
3. Let play for 10+ seconds.
4. Exit via BACK.
custom_expected:
Current program should not appear in:

1. HOME carousel Watchlist/Continue Watching
1. MY ACCOUNT Watchlist/Continue Watching

title: Verify enabling parental controls will hide (yet preserve) restricted content from user’s Continue Watching list in Home Carousel
custom_preconds: Test account should be set with parental controls OFF and ONLY ONE TV-14 or higher rated item in Continue Watching.
custom_steps:
1. Confirm TV-14 or higher item appear in Continue Watching carousel thumb.
2. Go to My Account
3. Turn on Parental Controls by entering your PIN
4. Confirm TV-14 or higher Continue Watching carousel item does not appear.
5. Go to My Account again
6. Turn off Parental Controls by entering your PIN
9. Confirm TV-14 or higher Continue Watching carousel item appears as expected as seen in step 1.
custom_expected: Enabling parental controls will hide restricted content from user’s Continue Watching on Home Carousel and disabling enabling parental controls will reveal the same content.

title: Verify enabling parental controls will hide (yet preserve) restricted content from user’s Watchlist in Home Carousel
custom_preconds: Test account should be set with parental controls OFF and ONLY ONE TV-14 or higher rated item in Watchlist.
custom_steps:
1. Confirm TV-14 or higher item appear in Watchlist carousel thumb.
2. Go to My Account
3. Turn on Parental Controls by entering your PIN
4. Confirm TV-14 or higher Watchlist carousel item does not appear.
5. Go to My Account again
6. Turn off Parental Controls by entering your PIN
7. Confirm TV-14 or higher Watchlist carousel item appears as expected as seen in step 1.
custom_expected: Enabling parental controls will hide restricted content from user’s Watchlist on Home Carousel and disabling enabling parental controls will reveal the same content.

title: Verify empty Watchlists and Continue Watching lists disappear from the Home Carousel if no items have been added on the home screen
custom_expected: The spaces where the Continue Watching and Watchlist are replaced with the lower carousels.

title: Verify populated Watchlists and Continue Watching lists are shown in Home Carousel
***Shows: Verify user is able to navigate the Shows row without issue
***Shows: Verify Featured shows display as configured
***Shows: Verify all available shows are displayed on the carousel for the user to scroll through.
custom_preconds: note: QA is not provided a list of shows in the library to reference, but we can compare with Web or other application to judge if the shows list is being received and displayed as expected in app.

title: Show: Verify accessing a show from the Shows Submenu opens a Show Page successfully
custom_preconds:

AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we have navigated to the Shows Submenu
custom_steps: WHEN we select a random Show

THEN the Show Page will open
AND the Show's title will appear as the Submenu Title in the top-right corner
AND the current year will display as a top episode row (if applicable)
AND the Available episodes will appear under the year header in a column
AND the episode's metadata will appear at left when in focus
(AND subsequent/succeeding years will display at right/left)

AND we have navigated to the Pay Per View Category row
custom_steps: WHEN we select a random Show
custom_expected:
THEN the Show Page will open
AND the Show's title will appear as the Submenu Title in the top-right corner
AND the Year Navigation bar will appear under the show title
AND the current (or most recent) year will be opened by default
AND the Available episodes will appear under the year header in a row
AND the episode's metadata will appear beneath the show

custom_steps: WHEN we look at the episode row

AND the newest episodes will display first in the row
AND the oldest episodes will display last in the row

NOTE: Collections' assets are curated lists and not necessarily sequential by date

title: Schedule: Verify programs display in an ascending order for the given day

custom_steps:

and we select Log Out

title: ***Verify: Verify if the user's profile access rights update that these are reflected in the Channel's viewable content
custom_preconds:

AND we have successfully logged in with a WWE account
custom_steps: WHEN the accounts' access rights/parental restrictions are updated on the WWE website
custom_expected:
THEN the changes will be reflected in the application
AND the newly restricted content will be hidden/removed
OR the newly unrestricted content will now be available

REPEAT for both circumstances

title: ***Verify: Confirm that logging out as one user and logging in as another access rights behave accordingly (unrestricted to restricted)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have successfully logged in with a WWE account
AND the account has no parental restrictions
custom_steps:
WHEN navigate to the My Profile section
AND we select Log Out
AND we login with an account that has parental restrictions
custom_expected:
THEN the new user will be unable to view the previously unrestricted content
AND the content will be hidden accordingly

title: ***Verify: Confirm that logging out as one user and logging in as another access rights behave accordingly (restricted to unrestricted)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have successfully logged in with a WWE account
AND the account has parental restrictions
custom_steps:
WHEN navigate to the My Profile section
AND we select Log Out
AND we login with an account that has NO parental restrictions
custom_expected:
THEN the new user will be able to view the previously restricted content
AND the content will have no access right issues

title: Play: Verify Player UI appear for after any button is pressed (except menu; which exits video playback)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
custom_steps:
WHEN we launch a video feed
AND we interact with siri remote
custom_expected:
THEN the player 

1. UI overlays the video playback

> swipe up:  timeline displays
> swipe down:  Metadata/info display
> click left/right:  playhead will jump 10 seconds back/fwd (depending in the click direction)
> click/select: will pause or resume depending on the current playback state
> click/select and then swipe left/right: moves playhead to new position for fast scan forward/back; playback will resume from new playhead position.

> Menu button:  Video player closes and user is returned to previous page

title: Play: Verify that linear playback can continue for up to 2 hours without issue

AND there is a LIVE event
custom_steps:

AND we receive the Playback Option prompt
AND we select "Watch Live"
AND we stay in the Linear stream for at least 2 hours
custom_expected:
THEN playback will continue as expected
AND the user will not be kicked out of the stream

test

Scenario: User taps Sign in With My WWE Account
custom_preconds:
Given we have installed WWE Network
And we have NOT launched the Application yet
And we launch the Application
And we are not logged in to a web subscriber account
And we navigate to the paywall
custom_steps: And we tap the "Sign in With My WWE Account"
custom_expected:
Then we are taken to the standard account login screen
And the account screen has a 'Submit' button
And the account screen has a field for email address

title: Scenario: IAP - Subscribe Now with iTunes
custom_preconds:
Given we have installed WWE
And we are not signed into an iTunes account on the Apple TV
And we launch the Application
And we are not logged in to a web subscriber account
custom_steps:
When we tap on paid content
And we are shown the paywall
And we select Subscribe Now with iTunes
And we agree to the Terms and Conditions legal Policies
custom_expected:
Then we will prompted to enter iTunes credentials.

(IAP checks tested elsewhere)

title: Scenario: User taps paywall close button
custom_preconds:
Given we have installed WWE
And we are not signed into an iTunes account on the Apple TV
And we launch the Application
And we are not logged in to a web subscriber account
custom_steps:
When we tap on paid content
And we are shown the paywall
And we press menu button to go back
custom_expected:
Then the paywall dismisses
AND a message is displayed stating "WWE Networks - Cannot connect to iTunes Store"
AND there is an 'OK' button
AND we press the menu button again
THEN user is returned to their previous screen

title: Scenario: Restore with iTunes
custom_preconds:
Given we have installed WWE
And we are not signed into an iTunes account on the Apple TV
And we launch the Application
And we are not logged in to a web subscriber account
custom_steps:
When we tap on paid content
And we are shown the paywall
And we select Restore iTunes purchase
custom_expected: Then the user is prompted to enter their iTunes credentials

title: Scenario: Global Store support
custom_preconds:
Given we have installed the app
And we have not made any previous In-App purchases
And we have not previously signed in with a web authorized account
custom_steps:
When we attempt to login with a non-US iTunes account
And the iTunes storefront switches to the proper location
And we exit/quit the application COMPLETELY
And we relaunch the app
When we attempt again to subscribe with the account
custom_expected:
Then the price (image) in the paywall will be localized for the country of the iTunes account
And the subscription price can be confirmed by completing the subscription process

title: Paywall Screen: Verify all the Text is clear and readable
custom_preconds:
Given we have installed WWE
And we are not signed into an iTunes account on the Apple TV
And we launch the Application
And we are not logged in to a web subscriber account
custom_steps:
When we tap on paid content
And we are shown the paywall
And we highlight Sign In with My WWE account
And we highlight Subscribe Now with iTunes
And we highlight Restore iTunes purchase
custom_expected:
Then we see the expected text and appearance for all three Paywall sub-sections
And all text is formatted correctly and readable

title: Scenario: Selecting the 'Subscribe Now With iTunes" option prompts iTunes account login
custom_preconds:
Given we have installed WWE
And we launch the Application
And we are not logged in to a web subscriber account
custom_steps:
When we tap on paid content
And select the 'Subscribe Now With iTunes' button
custom_expected:
Then we are prompted to enter our iTunes credentials
And we receive a message asking to confirm the subscription for $9.99
And we are told that the subscription will automatically renew until canceled
And we tap Confirm

title: Scenario: iTunes Account Login Fails when user attempts to purchase the Monthly WWE Subscription option with invalid credentials
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed WWE
AND we launch the Application
AND we are not logged in to a web subscriber account
AND we tap on paid content
AND select the 'Subscribe with iTunes' button
custom_steps:
WHEN we are prompted with a message to confirm the subscription price/auto renewal
AND we tap 'confirm'
AND we are prompted to enter iTunes credentials
AND the credentials we enter are invalid
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be messaged that their login information is invalid
AND the user will be asked to try logging in again

title: Scneario: User successfully purchases WWE Monthly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed WWE
AND we have NOT launched the Application yet
AND we launch the Application
AND we are not logged in to a web subscriber account
AND we tap on paid content
AND select the 'Subscribe with iTunes' button
AND the user taps 'confirm' on the subscription confirmation alert
custom_steps:
When the user is prompted to enter iTunes credentials
And the iTunes credentials are valid
And the In App Purchase is successful
custom_expected:
Then the paywall will dismiss
And the user will be able to access all paid content

title: Scenario: User attempts to Restore Purchase on the WWE App
Scenario: User that has previously purchased WWE through IAP, deletes the application and reinstalls, then attempts to restore purchase

And the user has deleted the application
And the user has re-installed the application
custom_steps:
When the user launches the application
And accesses the pay wall
And taps the 'Restore iTunes Purchase' Restore button
custom_expected:
Then the user is prompted to enter their iTunes credentials
And upon entering the credentials that were previously used for In-App Purchase the user will be granted access
And tapping on any paid features will give the user access

title: *** Scenario: User that has previously purchased WWE through IAP, attempts to restore purchase on a secondary device
Scenario: Non-entitled user attempts to access paid content

custom_steps:

And the user logs in with a WWE Network web account that has not been entitled

[OK] button dismisses message and users returned to Sign in/Subscribe/Restore page

custom_steps:

And the user is presented with the paywall
And the user taps on 'Sign in with my WWE Account' button
And the user logs in with a WWE Network web account that has been entitled for paid content
custom_expected:

And when the user attempts to access a paid feature they will be granted access
And if the user navigates to settings they will see their entitled account logged in

title: Scenario: Verify that the Single Sign on Restriction message reads appropriately
custom_preconds:
Given we have installed WWE Network
And we have launched the Application
And we have navigated to the paywall
custom_steps:
When we restore a purchase using the 'Already purchased?' Restore button
And we restore on 6 devices using the same account
And we access paid content (live media) on all 6 devices within 30 minutes
custom_expected:
Then the user will get a message explaining that too many users are trying to access media from this account
And the message is clear without grammatical errors
And the message can be dismissed
And the account will be locked for 30 minutes before allowing the user to access media again

title: Scenario: User buys the application using IAP and then links it to web subscriber account that has no previous entitlements
custom_preconds: Given a user buys the application through in-app purchase
custom_steps: When the user links it to a WWE Network web account without previous entitlement
custom_expected:
Then the web account should be linked
And we can verify that the account was linked in the Customer Service Tool
And when we login to a second device with the linked account the proper content will be unlocked

title: Scenario: User logs into the application using a web subscriber account that has no previous entitlements and purchases IAP, user then manually links account
custom_preconds: Given the user logs into the app with a WWE Network web account without previous entitlement
custom_steps:
When a user buys the application through in-app purchase
And manually links their WWE Network web account
custom_expected:
Then the web account should be linked
And we can verify that the account was linked in the Customer Service Tool
And when we login to a second device with the linked account the proper content will be unlocked

title: Continue Watching Content Check
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the WWE app has been launched
AND that the user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN we navigate to HOME > Continue Watching list
custom_expected:
THEN the content appears as expected (matches user's actual list)
AND all can be navigated to
AND when activated, each jumps to the expected page

title: Verify Multi-language does not appear on PPV Detail Page during Live Linear Stream (Pre-Show)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we have navigated to the Pay Per View Category row
custom_steps: WHEN we select the PPV Live Linear Stream
custom_expected:
THEN the PPV Show Page will open
AND the Show's title will appear 
AND the episode's metadata will appear beneath the Show title 
AND the Show's Air Time and Duration will appear
AND the Watch Live button will appear
AND the Watch from Beginning button will appear
AND the Add Episode button will appear
AND the Add Series button will appear
AND a Change Language button will NOT appear

Mandarin
